h1: Biden expected to nominate Dr. Vivek Murthy to reprise role as US surgeon general
first_p: (CNN)As he builds out his health team, President-elect Joe Biden is expected to nominate Dr. Vivek Murthy as US Surgeon General, two sources familiar with the matter confirmed to CNN, returning to the role he served in during the Obama administration.
article_text: Biden expected to nominate Dr. Vivek Murthy to reprise role as US surgeon general  (CNN)As he builds out his health team, President-elect Joe Biden is expected to nominate Dr. Vivek Murthy as US Surgeon General, two sources familiar with the matter confirmed to CNN, returning to the role he served in during the Obama administration. Biden's Cabinet decisions show difficult balance in diversity pushA crumbling infrastructure puts these Biden Cabinet positions in the spotlightBiden weighs ambassador picks amid pressure to diversifyMAP: Full presidential election results

h1: White House vaccine chief praises Biden's plan to ask Americans to wear masks for first 100 days
first_p: Washington (CNN)Moncef Slaoui, the head of the US government's effort to develop a vaccine against Covid-19, on Sunday praised President-elect Joe Biden's plan to ask all Americans to wear masks to curb the spread of the coronavirus, saying the practice is key as the country awaits widespread distribution of the vaccine.
article_text: White House vaccine chief praises Biden's plan to ask Americans to wear masks for first 100 days Washington (CNN)Moncef Slaoui, the head of the US government's effort to develop a vaccine against Covid-19, on Sunday praised President-elect Joe Biden's plan to ask all Americans to wear masks to curb the spread of the coronavirus, saying the practice is key as the country awaits widespread distribution of the vaccine.   CNN's Michael Warren, Dan Merica and Tara Subramaniam contributed to this report.

h1: Biden expected to nominate Xavier Becerra to lead Health and Human Services
first_p: (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden is poised to nominate California Attorney General Xavier Becerra to lead the Department of Health and Human Services, a Biden transition official tells CNN.
article_text: Biden expected to nominate Xavier Becerra to lead Health and Human Services  (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden is poised to nominate California Attorney General Xavier Becerra to lead the Department of Health and Human Services, a Biden transition official tells CNN. h1: Biden's already more popular than Trump's ever been
first_p: (CNN)Poll of the week: A new Gallup poll finds that President-elect Joe Biden has a 55% favorable rating and a 41% unfavorable rating.

h1: Trump administration pushes 'midnight regulations' after breaking records for final-year rulemaking
first_p: Washington (CNN)President Donald Trump's political appointees are finalizing an array of last-minute federal regulations ahead of Joe Biden's inauguration, including rules that would make it harder to enforce environmental protections, tighten immigration, remove penalties for killing birds, and possibly eliminate food assistance for millions of Americans.
article_text: Trump administration pushes 'midnight regulations' after breaking records for final-year rulemaking  Washington (CNN)President Donald Trump's political appointees are finalizing an array of last-minute federal regulations ahead of Joe Biden's inauguration, including rules that would make it harder to enforce environmental protections, tighten immigration, remove penalties for killing birds, and possibly eliminate food assistance for millions of Americans. Trump pressured Georgia governor in call to help overturn Biden's win in stateFact checking Trump's month of shifting, consistently baseless claims for why he lost the electionPence's political future remains clouded by TrumpMAP: Full presidential election results  CNN's Tami Luhby, Priscilla Alvarez and Christina Carrega contributed to this report.

h1: Biden transition to receive defense intelligence briefings on Monday
first_p: (CNN)Members of the Biden transition team are scheduled to receive briefings from the Pentagon's intelligence agencies beginning on Monday, according to defense officials.
article_text: Biden transition to receive defense intelligence briefings on Monday  (CNN)Members of the Biden transition team are scheduled to receive briefings from the Pentagon's intelligence agencies beginning on Monday, according to defense officials.

h1: America is going from an outsider president to the ultimate insider
first_p: (CNN)Joe Biden breaks the mold of recent US presidents in a very important way: He's a Washington survivor.

h1: Pentagon blocked Biden's intelligence transition team from meeting with agencies
first_p: (CNN)The Trump administration prevented President-elect Joe Biden's transition team from meeting with its counterparts at Pentagon intelligence agencies this week, according to a former senior intelligence official familiar with intelligence transition discussions.
article_text: Pentagon blocked Biden's intelligence transition team from meeting with agencies  (CNN)The Trump administration prevented President-elect Joe Biden's transition team from meeting with its counterparts at Pentagon intelligence agencies this week, according to a former senior intelligence official familiar with intelligence transition discussions. h1: Trump pressured Georgia governor in call to help overturn Biden's win in state
first_p: (CNN)President Donald Trump on Saturday called Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp, pushing him to convince state legislators to overturn President-elect Joe Biden's win in the state, a source familiar with the conversation told CNN.
article_text: Trump pressured Georgia governor in call to help overturn Biden's win in state  (CNN)President Donald Trump on Saturday called Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp, pushing him to convince state legislators to overturn President-elect Joe Biden's win in the state, a source familiar with the conversation told CNN. h1: A crumbling infrastructure puts these Biden Cabinet positions in the spotlight
first_p: (CNN)Joe Biden's plan to remake America's crumbling infrastructure as President is expected to increase the pressure on three key Cabinet picks to work together for results that Americans can see clearly and quickly in the early months of his presidency, sources told CNN.

h1: How Joe Biden's past could shape Kamala Harris' future as vice president
first_p: Kate Andersen Brower is the author of the New York Times bestsellers "First Women: The Grace and Power of America's Modern First Ladies" and "The Residence: Inside the Private World of the White House." This reporting comes in part from her book, "First in Line: Presidents, Vice Presidents and the Pursuit of Power." Her latest book, "Exploring the White House: Inside America's Most Famous Home," is for children and will be published December 8. Unless otherwise noted, facts in this piece reflect research from her work. The opinions expressed here are hers. Read more opinion on CNN.com.
article_text: How Joe Biden's past could shape Kamala Harris' future as vice president Kate Andersen Brower is the author of the New York Times bestsellers "First Women: The Grace and Power of America's Modern First Ladies" and "The Residence: Inside the Private World of the White House." This reporting comes in part from her book, "First in Line: Presidents, Vice Presidents and the Pursuit of Power." Her latest book, "Exploring the White House: Inside America's Most Famous Home," is for children and will be published December 8. Unless otherwise noted, facts in this piece reflect research from her work. The opinions expressed here are hers. Read more opinion on CNN.com.  (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden knows the challenges and the opportunities of the vice presidency better than any incoming president since George H.W. Bush.

h1: Biden on Trump administration distributing vaccine: 'There is no detailed plan'
first_p: Washington (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden said Friday that the Trump administration had shared information with his transition team about distributing a vaccine to various states, but Biden said his team had not seen a "detailed plan."
article_text: Biden on Trump administration distributing vaccine: 'There is no detailed plan'  Washington (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden said Friday that the Trump administration had shared information with his transition team about distributing a vaccine to various states, but Biden said his team had not seen a "detailed plan." h1: California Attorney General Xavier Becerra emerges as contender to lead Health and Human Services
first_p: (CNN)California Attorney General Xavier Becerra has emerged as a key contender to lead the Department of Health and Human Services, two people familiar with the matter say, as President-elect Joe Biden weighs who to tap for a role that will be critical to his administration's efforts to combat the coronavirus pandemic.
article_text: California Attorney General Xavier Becerra emerges as contender to lead Health and Human Services  (CNN)California Attorney General Xavier Becerra has emerged as a key contender to lead the Department of Health and Human Services, two people familiar with the matter say, as President-elect Joe Biden weighs who to tap for a role that will be critical to his administration's efforts to combat the coronavirus pandemic. h1: Pompeo willing to meet with incoming Biden team, officials say
first_p: (CNN)State Department officials who work with Secretary of State Mike Pompeo have told the department's career transition team that he will meet with President-elect Joe Biden's incoming State Department team, according to two sources familiar with the message.
article_text: Pompeo willing to meet with incoming Biden team, officials say  (CNN)State Department officials who work with Secretary of State Mike Pompeo have told the department's career transition team that he will meet with President-elect Joe Biden's incoming State Department team, according to two sources familiar with the message.

h1: Biden's popular vote margin over Trump tops 7 million
first_p: Washington (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden's margin over President Donald Trump in the nationwide popular vote is now more than 7 million votes and may continue to grow as several states continue counting votes.
article_text: Biden's popular vote margin over Trump tops 7 million Washington (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden's margin over President Donald Trump in the nationwide popular vote is now more than 7 million votes and may continue to grow as several states continue counting votes.

h1: CNN Exclusive: Biden says he will ask Americans to wear masks for the first 100 days he's in office
first_p: (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden told CNN's Jake Tapper on Thursday that he will ask Americans to wear masks for the first 100 days after he takes office, in a sign of how Biden's approach to the virus will be dramatically different from President Donald Trump's response.
article_text: CNN Exclusive: Biden says he will ask Americans to wear masks for the first 100 days he's in office  (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden told CNN's Jake Tapper on Thursday that he will ask Americans to wear masks for the first 100 days after he takes office, in a sign of how Biden's approach to the virus will be dramatically different from President Donald Trump's response. h1: Biden wrestles with politics in effort to depoliticize the Justice Department
first_p: Washington (CNN)Political questions from Democrats and a new Republican litmus test have suddenly become complicating factors in one of President-elect Joe Biden's most critical choices: picking a new Attorney General to lead the Justice Department out of its highly politicized era.
article_text: Biden wrestles with politics in effort to depoliticize the Justice Department  Washington (CNN)Political questions from Democrats and a new Republican litmus test have suddenly become complicating factors in one of President-elect Joe Biden's most critical choices: picking a new Attorney General to lead the Justice Department out of its highly politicized era.

h1: What Biden gets about being president -- and Trump doesn't
first_p: Errol Louis is the host of "Inside City Hall," a nightly political show on NY1, a New York all-news channel. The opinions expressed in this commentary are his own. View more opinion articles on CNN.
article_text: What Biden gets about being president -- and Trump doesn't Errol Louis is the host of "Inside City Hall," a nightly political show on NY1, a New York all-news channel. The opinions expressed in this commentary are his own. View more opinion articles on CNN.  (CNN)It was especially refreshing to see President-elect Joe Biden and Vice President-elect Kamala Harris use their CNN interview with Jake Tapper on Thursday to make clear that leading America is, first and always, a complex effort requiring the cooperation and good will of millions.  Sign up for CNN Opinion's new newsletter. Join us on Twitter and Facebook

h1: Biden on nominating diverse Cabinet: 'I'm going to keep my commitment'
first_p: (CNN)Joe Biden said Thursday he would keep his commitment to nominate a Cabinet that reflects America's diversity, as the President-elect faces increasing pressure to appoint Black and Latino nominees to remaining high-level Cabinet positions.
article_text: Biden on nominating diverse Cabinet: 'I'm going to keep my commitment'  (CNN)Joe Biden said Thursday he would keep his commitment to nominate a Cabinet that reflects America's diversity, as the President-elect faces increasing pressure to appoint Black and Latino nominees to remaining high-level Cabinet positions.

h1: Biden says multiple Republican senators have called to congratulate him on election win
first_p: Washington (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden revealed Thursday that "more than several" Republican senators have called to privately congratulate him on his election win, despite the fact that most of them have not publicly acknowledged his victory last month.
article_text: Biden says multiple Republican senators have called to congratulate him on election win Washington (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden revealed Thursday that "more than several" Republican senators have called to privately congratulate him on his election win, despite the fact that most of them have not publicly acknowledged his victory last month. CNN's Chandelis Duster contributed to this report.

h1: Biden team weighs North Korea policy as the era of Trump's 'love' letters with Kim ends
first_p: (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden's foreign policy team will soon have access to the letters President Donald Trump exchanged with North Korean Leader Kim Jong Un, correspondence that belongs to the US government -- not Trump -- and could provide insight into one of the world's most enigmatic leaders.
article_text: Biden team weighs North Korea policy as the era of Trump's 'love' letters with Kim ends  (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden's foreign policy team will soon have access to the letters President Donald Trump exchanged with North Korean Leader Kim Jong Un, correspondence that belongs to the US government -- not Trump -- and could provide insight into one of the world's most enigmatic leaders.

h1: Biden said he asked Fauci to stay on and be a chief medical adviser in his administration
first_p: (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden said Thursday that he had asked Dr. Anthony Fauci earlier in the day to stay on in his role and to be a chief medical adviser in Biden's incoming administration.
article_text: Biden said he asked Fauci to stay on and be a chief medical adviser in his administration  (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden said Thursday that he had asked Dr. Anthony Fauci earlier in the day to stay on in his role and to be a chief medical adviser in Biden's incoming administration.

h1: Biden faces increasing pressure to diversify his Cabinet
first_p: (CNN)A group of lawmakers and civil rights groups are demanding that President-elect Joe Biden appoint Black and Latino nominees to some of the remaining high-level Cabinet positions, as Biden faces increasing pressure to diversify his administration.
article_text: Biden faces increasing pressure to diversify his Cabinet   (CNN)A group of lawmakers and civil rights groups are demanding that President-elect Joe Biden appoint Black and Latino nominees to some of the remaining high-level Cabinet positions, as Biden faces increasing pressure to diversify his administration.  CNN's Jake Tapper to interview Joe Biden and Kamala Harris in first joint interview since winning electionBiden fills out his inauguration teamBiden unlikely to tap Democrats from Congress for administration postsMAP: Full presidential election results  CNN"s Jessica Dean, MJ Lee and Sarah Mucha contributed to this report.

h1: Neera Tanden deleted tweets slamming GOP senators ahead of nomination to become OMB director
first_p: (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden's pick to become the next director of the Office of Management and Budget, a key economic post that oversees the production of the president's proposed budget for his agenda, deleted critical tweets of GOP senators on Twitter, setting the stage for a tough confirmation process.
article_text: Neera Tanden deleted tweets slamming GOP senators ahead of nomination to become OMB director    (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden's pick to become the next director of the Office of Management and Budget, a key economic post that oversees the production of the president's proposed budget for his agenda, deleted critical tweets of GOP senators on Twitter, setting the stage for a tough confirmation process.

h1: Senate GOP warns Biden on Cabinet picks as some Democrats push for more liberal choices
first_p: (CNN)Joe Biden is facing dueling headwinds as he looks to fill out his Cabinet: Senate Republicans want the President-elect to consult with them and choose nominees who could win their support, while liberal Democrats are pushing him to name progressives who could shape the policies of his government.
article_text: Senate GOP warns Biden on Cabinet picks as some Democrats push for more liberal choices  (CNN)Joe Biden is facing dueling headwinds as he looks to fill out his Cabinet: Senate Republicans want the President-elect to consult with them and choose nominees who could win their support, while liberal Democrats are pushing him to name progressives who could shape the policies of his government.  CNN's Lauren Koenig contributed to this story.

h1: Biden readies major stimulus push and flurry of executive actions in first 100 days
first_p: (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden and his transition team are preparing for an early, all-out push to pass an ambitious new stimulus bill, while also drawing up plans for a flurry of executive actions aimed at delivering on campaign promises and undoing the Trump administration's efforts to undermine key government agencies.
article_text: Biden readies major stimulus push and flurry of executive actions in first 100 days  (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden and his transition team are preparing for an early, all-out push to pass an ambitious new stimulus bill, while also drawing up plans for a flurry of executive actions aimed at delivering on campaign promises and undoing the Trump administration's efforts to undermine key government agencies.    Biden announces all-female senior White House communications teamBiden moves quickly to build a diverse administrationBiden administration prepares to inherit controversial Trump immigration policiesMAP: Full presidential election results

h1: Hispanic lawmakers urge Biden to pick Lujan Grisham for HHS
first_p: (CNN)Members of the Congressional Hispanic Caucus have sent a letter to President-elect Joe Biden's transition team lobbying for New Mexico Gov. Michelle Lujan Grisham to be nominated for the role of health and human services secretary.
article_text: Hispanic lawmakers urge Biden to pick Lujan Grisham for HHS  (CNN)Members of the Congressional Hispanic Caucus have sent a letter to President-elect Joe Biden's transition team lobbying for New Mexico Gov. Michelle Lujan Grisham to be nominated for the role of health and human services secretary.

h1: Key lines from the unveiling of Biden's new economic team
first_p: Washington (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden on Tuesday introduced key members of his economic team at an event in Wilmington, Delaware, including Janet Yellen, who would be the first woman to serve as Treasury secretary.
article_text: Key lines from the unveiling of Biden's new economic team Washington (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden on Tuesday introduced key members of his economic team at an event in Wilmington, Delaware, including Janet Yellen, who would be the first woman to serve as Treasury secretary.  Here are the historic firsts in Biden's administrationBiden unveils senior leadership team charged with planning inaugurationBiden names diverse economic team with four women in top roles to help build recoveryMAP: Full presidential election results

h1: Jake Tapper to interview Joe Biden and Kamala Harris in first joint interview since winning election
first_p: Washington (CNN)CNN's Jake Tapper will interview President-elect Joe Biden and Vice President-elect Kamala Harris on Thursday in their first joint interview since winning the election, the network announced Tuesday.
article_text: Jake Tapper to interview Joe Biden and Kamala Harris in first joint interview since winning election Washington (CNN)CNN's Jake Tapper will interview President-elect Joe Biden and Vice President-elect Kamala Harris on Thursday in their first joint interview since winning the election, the network announced Tuesday.

h1: Biden unlikely to tap Democrats from Congress for administration posts
first_p: (CNN)As President-elect Joe Biden prepares to announce more key nominations and appointments to his administration, the door is closing on the prospect of tapping Democrats from one of his most cherished places in Washington: the halls of Congress.
article_text: Biden unlikely to tap Democrats from Congress for administration posts  (CNN)As President-elect Joe Biden prepares to announce more key nominations and appointments to his administration, the door is closing on the prospect of tapping Democrats from one of his most cherished places in Washington: the halls of Congress. h1: Trump said the stock market would crash if Biden won. The Dow just had its best month since 1987.
first_p: New York (CNN Business)President Donald Trump repeatedly warned Americans that if they failed to reelect him, the stock market would implode. In reality, the opposite happened.
article_text: Trump said the stock market would crash if Biden won. The Dow just had its best month since 1987. New York (CNN Business)President Donald Trump repeatedly warned Americans that if they failed to reelect him, the stock market would implode. In reality, the opposite happened.

h1: GOP senators' strategy on Trump's election fraud claims: Keep quiet and carry on
first_p: (CNN)A wide range of Republican senators are shrugging off President Donald Trump's evidence-free claims that mass voter fraud cost him the election, ignoring their party leader's relentless attacks against a foundation of American democracy amid their growing expectation that the matter will be resolved within two weeks -- without their involvement.
article_text: GOP senators' strategy on Trump's election fraud claims: Keep quiet and carry on   (CNN)A wide range of Republican senators are shrugging off President Donald Trump's evidence-free claims that mass voter fraud cost him the election, ignoring their party leader's relentless attacks against a foundation of American democracy amid their growing expectation that the matter will be resolved within two weeks -- without their involvement.  CNN's Daniella Diaz, Yahya Abou-Ghazala, Olanma Mang, Ted Barrett and Kristin Wilson contributed to this report.

h1: Biden's delay in picking a defense secretary opens top contenders to uncomfortable scrutiny
first_p: (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden enters the month of December with a question still looming over one of the most critical decisions in his Cabinet: Who will he nominate to be Secretary of Defense?
article_text: Biden's delay in picking a defense secretary opens top contenders to uncomfortable scrutiny   (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden enters the month of December with a question still looming over one of the most critical decisions in his Cabinet: Who will he nominate to be Secretary of Defense?  CNN's Alex Marquardt, Barbara Starr and MJ Lee contributed reporting

h1: Biden readies major stimulus push and flurry of executive actions in first 100 days
first_p: (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden and his transition team are preparing for an early, all-out push to pass an ambitious new stimulus bill, while also drawing up plans for a flurry of executive actions aimed at delivering on campaign promises and undoing the Trump administration's efforts to undermine key government agencies.
article_text: Biden readies major stimulus push and flurry of executive actions in first 100 days  (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden and his transition team are preparing for an early, all-out push to pass an ambitious new stimulus bill, while also drawing up plans for a flurry of executive actions aimed at delivering on campaign promises and undoing the Trump administration's efforts to undermine key government agencies. h1: Biden names diverse economic team with four women in top roles to help build recovery
first_p: (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden named key members of his economic team on Monday, with the long-expected announcement of Janet Yellen as treasury secretary along with three other women in top roles on a diverse team that will help him navigate the nation's punishing fiscal headwinds in hopes of building an economic recovery.
article_text: Biden names diverse economic team with four women in top roles to help build recovery   (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden named key members of his economic team on Monday, with the long-expected announcement of Janet Yellen as treasury secretary along with three other women in top roles on a diverse team that will help him navigate the nation's punishing fiscal headwinds in hopes of building an economic recovery. h1: Georgia Republican officials reject Trump's calls to overturn election results
first_p: (CNN)Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp and Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger, both Republicans, on Monday rebuffed President Donald Trump's calls to overturn the state's election results more than a week after they certified Joe Biden as the winner.
article_text: Georgia Republican officials reject Trump's calls to overturn election results  (CNN)Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp and Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger, both Republicans, on Monday rebuffed President Donald Trump's calls to overturn the state's election results more than a week after they certified Joe Biden as the winner. Some Republicans, including Roy Blunt, would like to see Trump at Biden's inaugurationBiden administration prepares to inherit controversial Trump immigration policiesPennsylvania Supreme Court dismisses another election case brought by RepublicansMAP: Full presidential election results  Biden announces all-female senior White House communications teamBiden moves quickly to build a diverse administrationBiden administration prepares to inherit controversial Trump immigration policiesMAP: Full presidential election results  CNN's Kristen Holmes and Marshall Cohen contributed to this report.

h1: Trump sees 'the writing on the wall' despite what he maintains publicly about the election, advisers say
first_p: (CNN)Despite what President Donald Trump is tweeting and saying publicly in the wake of Arizona and Wisconsin certifying President-elect Joe Biden's victory Monday, Trump sees the scoreboard and understands he has no chance of hanging on to the presidency, two White House advisers told CNN.
article_text: Trump sees 'the writing on the wall' despite what he maintains publicly about the election, advisers say   (CNN)Despite what President Donald Trump is tweeting and saying publicly in the wake of Arizona and Wisconsin certifying President-elect Joe Biden's victory Monday, Trump sees the scoreboard and understands he has no chance of hanging on to the presidency, two White House advisers told CNN. CNN's Nikki Carvajal, Bob Ortega, Samira Said, Marshall Cohen, Fredreka Schouten, Jeremy Diamond, Betsy Klein and Devan Cole contributed to this report.

h1: Wisconsin governor certifies state's electoral votes for Biden
first_p: (CNN)Wisconsin Gov. Tony Evers on Monday formally certified Joe Biden's victory, signing the paperwork to award the state's 10 electoral votes to the President-elect after a recount in Wisconsin's two most populous counties.
article_text: Wisconsin governor certifies state's electoral votes for Biden  (CNN)Wisconsin Gov. Tony Evers on Monday formally certified Joe Biden's victory, signing the paperwork to award the state's 10 electoral votes to the President-elect after a recount in Wisconsin's two most populous counties. h1: A leaderless America slips deep into a grim pandemic winter
first_p: (CNN)America is sliding into a winter limbo of alarming spikes in Covid-19 cases and deepening economic pain while an apathetic lame duck White House and a deadlocked Congress provide no political leadership.
article_text: A leaderless America slips deep into a grim pandemic winter  (CNN)America is sliding into a winter limbo of alarming spikes in Covid-19 cases and deepening economic pain while an apathetic lame duck White House and a deadlocked Congress provide no political leadership. h1: Biden announces all-female senior White House communications team
first_p: Washington (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden and Vice President-elect Kamala Harris on Sunday announced an all-female White House senior communications team, including former Obama White House communications director Jen Psaki as press secretary.
article_text: Biden announces all-female senior White House communications team  Washington (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden and Vice President-elect Kamala Harris on Sunday announced an all-female White House senior communications team, including former Obama White House communications director Jen Psaki as press secretary.

h1: Arizona certifies Biden's victory
first_p: (CNN)Arizona certified its election results on Monday, awarding the state's 11 electoral votes to President-elect Joe Biden and clearing the way for Senator-elect Mark Kelly, a Democrat, to be sworn in this week.
article_text: Arizona certifies Biden's victory  (CNN)Arizona certified its election results on Monday, awarding the state's 11 electoral votes to President-elect Joe Biden and clearing the way for Senator-elect Mark Kelly, a Democrat, to be sworn in this week. h1: Here are the historic firsts in Biden's administration
first_p: Washington (CNN)Several of President-elect Joe Biden's nominees would make history if confirmed by the United States Senate to serve in top roles in his incoming administration.
article_text: Here are the historic firsts in Biden's administration  Washington (CNN)Several of President-elect Joe Biden's nominees would make history if confirmed by the United States Senate to serve in top roles in his incoming administration.

h1: Why Joe Biden's broken foot reveals how different his White House will be from Donald Trump's
first_p: (CNN)Days before Thanksgiving last year, President Donald Trump made an unannounced and previously unscheduled trip to Walter Reed medical center. The White House said the trip was for a "quick exam and labs." We still don't know why he actually went -- or what the outcome of his visit was.
article_text: Why Joe Biden's broken foot reveals how different his White House will be from Donald Trump's  (CNN)Days before Thanksgiving last year, President Donald Trump made an unannounced and previously unscheduled trip to Walter Reed medical center. The White House said the trip was for a "quick exam and labs." We still don't know why he actually went -- or what the outcome of his visit was.  THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE!  In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

h1: Biden weighs history-making picks for defense secretary
first_p: (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden is entering the month of December weighing several barrier-breaking candidates to be his Secretary of Defense.
article_text: Biden weighs history-making picks for defense secretary  (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden is entering the month of December weighing several barrier-breaking candidates to be his Secretary of Defense.

h1: The worsening pandemic raises the stakes for Biden's economic program
first_p: (CNN)Sitting in an Iowa diner a year ago, candidate Joe Biden aimed his economic agenda at the widening gap between America's rich and everyone else.

h1: Biden set to receive first president's daily intelligence brief Monday
first_p: Washington (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden marks a milestone on his path to the White House Monday when he gets his first President's Daily Brief -- the intelligence community's collection of secrets, intelligence, and analysis about long- and short-term threats US leaders need to know to run the country and keep it safe.
article_text: Biden set to receive first president's daily intelligence brief Monday Washington (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden marks a milestone on his path to the White House Monday when he gets his first President's Daily Brief -- the intelligence community's collection of secrets, intelligence, and analysis about long- and short-term threats US leaders need to know to run the country and keep it safe.

h1: Biden unveils senior leadership team charged with planning inauguration
first_p: (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden and Vice President-elect Kamala Harris on Monday announced the senior leadership of the committee charged with planning and executing what will be an unprecedented presidential inauguration, as it is set to take place during a global pandemic.
article_text: Biden unveils senior leadership team charged with planning inauguration  (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden and Vice President-elect Kamala Harris on Monday announced the senior leadership of the committee charged with planning and executing what will be an unprecedented presidential inauguration, as it is set to take place during a global pandemic.
